synopsis.text: Due to her dark aura and long black hair, Sawako Kuronuma is often misunderstood and feared by her classmates, who have nicknamed her Sadako after the ghost girl from 'The Ring'. However, everything changes when she meets Kazehaya Shouta, the most popular guy in class, whose refreshing personality and kind heart earns Sawako's admiration. As Sawako enters her second year of high school, she finds herself in the same class as Kazehaya and her friends, Ayane and Chizuru. But when a new student, Kent, enters the scene and takes an interest in Sawako, Kazehaya's patience is put to the test. With Valentine's Day approaching, Sawako struggles to convey her feelings to Kazehaya, while Kazehaya tries to find a way to express his own feelings for her. As Sawako's relationship with Kent develops, she must navigate the challenges of high school and find the courage to follow her heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
